titleStmt.title: A threefold alphabet of rules, concerning Christian-practice. The first precept of every letter concerning our duty toward God; the second towards our neighbour; the third towards our selves. Gathered at a friends request in this order for the helping the memory. / Revised and approved for Dr. Thomas Taylor's own collection, by William Jemmat Minister at Reading.
titleStmt.author: Jemmat, William, 1596?-1678.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
